about.content1: Zebra Lounge is a unique space that combines wonderful passion of the hookah, fragrant of real Chinese tea and variety of exotic cocktails. We have the "smokest" hookah, fascinating board games and greatest alcoholic cocktails. Combined with rhythmic music and a friendly atmosphere - Zebra is your resting place.
about.content2: Our establishment is located at the heart of the stone jungle - Maidan Nezalezhnosti. We welcome you every day from noon to midnight.
